column4: if i dont have the gcc command available to me. or the ./configure or make, what do i need to do?
my aim is to use a program called checkinstall to make sourcecode into ubuntu packages
this is the first time ive used linux.  i have no idea of what and where with linux.  can i get gcc, make, etc with the add application program?
there's thousands of packages in the Ubuntu repos, you can probably get 99% of what you want w/o compiling a thing. What apps are you looking for?
